We hope that we can get as many volunteers as possible to publish their code on
this website. This section provides a full list of posts and their authors.

```{r, layout="l-page"}
library(DT)

jsonlite::fromJSON(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mrcaseb/open-source-football/master/docs/posts/posts.json",
  flatten = TRUE
) %>%
  tidyr::unnest_wider(author) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
  name = glue::glue('<a href = "{url}">{name}</a>'),
  title = glue::glue('<a href = "https://mrcaseb.github.io/open-source-football/{path}">{title}</a>')
  ) %>%
  dplyr::select(name, date, title) %>%
  DT::datatable(
    extensions = c('FixedHeader'),

      # set some options
      options = list(

        # Show table and table info
        # dom = "ti",

        # format all columns to align center
        # no searching or ordering for the rownames col
        # only descending order starting with col 2
        columnDefs = list(
          list(className = 'dt-center', targets = "_all")
          # list(targets = 1,
          #      render = JS(
          #        "function(data, type, row, meta) {",
          #        "return '<img src=\"' + data + '\" height=\"10%\">';",
          #        "}"))
          # list(orderSequence = c("desc"), targets = c(2:7))
          ),

        # Highlight order column
        orderClasses = TRUE,

        # fix the table header
        fixedHeader = TRUE

        ),

      # change column names
      colnames = c("Author", "Published", "Title"),

      rownames = FALSE,

      # enable column filtering and put the filter at the top (can be bottom as well)
      filter = "bottom",
      escape = FALSE
    ) %>%

    # format some columns with a number of decimal digits
    DT::formatDate(columns = 2)
```
